title: How to Make Peppermint Patty Pudding Shots

steps.headline: Prepare the shot cups.
steps.description: Make individual rows of 1-ounce cups on a baking sheet.

steps.headline: Combine the milk and pudding powder thoroughly in a large bowl.
Measure and pour the schnapps into the bowl.
Use an ice cream scoop to evenly measure the pudding mixture into the cups.
Set the pudding.
steps.description: Cover the cups with lids and freeze them until serving.

text: Prepare the shot cups. Make individual rows of 1-ounce cups on a baking sheet. Combine the milk and pudding powder thoroughly in a large bowl.  Measure and pour the schnapps into the bowl. Thoroughly whisk everything together. Use an ice cream scoop to evenly measure the pudding mixture into the cups.  Set the pudding. Cover the cups with lids and freeze them until serving. Serve with plastic spoons.
